title: フニャフニャでヘロヘロ

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'm gonna make lots of wishes so I can get stronger!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: First, the memo I prepared... Hmm. They say it's better to tell your wishes specifically and in detail, after all.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? The writing's all wobbly and I can't read it!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haaah~... That's right, I need to organize what I'm gonna ask the gods for...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Umm... "Heavy tires"... to be strong enough to pull...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: H, huh? "Satoi Yuujinryoku"...? I can't read it at all~!
It was Matikanetannhauser, who couldn't deliver her wish to the gods...
